Package graphanalyzer.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Controller class of the application.

    The model and the view get initialized in this class. Interactions with the view lead to a notification of the controller.

    Author:
    paulehler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AlgorithmRoutine algRoutine
      An instance of a routine that will compute the selected algorithm
      private java.lang.String chosenAlgorithm
      The chosen algorithm by the user
      private DirectedGraph graph
      A graph to be used for a given algorithm
      private MainGUI mainGUI
      The main user interface, all panels will get drawn on this frame

      A ResourceBundle that is used for internationalization of all drawn dialogs

      Autogenerated unique serial version identifier
      private Settings settings
      An instance of the #Settings class

      void changeAlgorithm​(java.lang.String algorithm)
      This method is invoked when a new algorithm has been chosen in DescriptionPanel.algorithmCombo and updates the DescriptionPanel to show the right introduction.
      Graph getGraph()  
      Settings getSettings()  
      void openFromFile()
      TODO : Implement in future release.
      void requestAlgorithm()
      This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by ControlPanel.startButton and initializes algRoutine with the chosen algorithm.
      void requestNewDirectedGraph()
      This method is invoked when a new graph has been chosen in the dialog created by MainMenuBar.itemNew and reads the GraphML file to draw the graph.
      void requestNewGraph()
      This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by MainMenuBar.itemNew and opens a dialog to choose a new graph.
      void requestNextStep()
      This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by ControlPanel.nextButton and will invoke the nextStep() method of algRoutine.
      void requestPreviousStep()
      This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by graphanalyzer.view.panels.ControlPanel#previousButton and will invoke the previousStep() method of algRoutine.

      TODO : Implement in future release.
